SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
Represents a Bishop piece in the chess game.
BlackPlayer
Represents a player with black pieces in a chess game.
Board
Represents a Board in a chess game.
Board.Builder
Represents a builder for creating a Board object with a custom configuration of pieces.
BoardData
The `BoardData` class provides utility methods and data structures related to the chess board layout.
Changer
Represents a change in the game state caused by a move.
Color
 
HistoryPanel
Panel to display the move history.
King
Represents a King piece in the chess game.
Knight
Represents a Knight piece in the chess game.
Main
 
Move
Represents a move in the chess game.
Move.AttackMove
Represents a move made by a piece to attack an opponent's piece on the board.
Move.AttackMove.MoveCreator
Creates moves based on the current board position and the coordinates of the source and destination squares.
Move.MajorPieceAttackMove
Represents an attack move made by a major piece (Queen, Rook, or Bishop) on a chess board.
Move.MajorPieceRegularMove
Represents a regular move for a major piece (rook, bishop, queen, or king).
Move.MinorPieceAttackMove
Represents a move made by a minor piece (pawn) to attack an opponent's piece.
Move.MinorPieceRegularMove
Represents a regular move made by a minor piece (pawn).
Move.PawnJump
Represents a pawn's jump move, typically occurring when a pawn moves two squares forward from its starting position.
Move.PawnPromotion
Represents a promotion move, which is a type of move where a pawn is promoted to another piece upon reaching the last rank.
MoveSt
Enum representing the state of a move.
Pawn
Represents a pawn piece in the chess game.
Piece
Represents a chess piece on the game board.
Piece.PieceType
Represents the type of the piece.
PieceData
Enum singleton class responsible for managing all possible moved pawns and queens.
Player
Abstract class representing a player in the chess game.
Queen
Represents a queen chess piece.
Rook
Represents a rook chess piece.
Square
Square represents a single square on a chess board.
Square.EmptySquare
Represents an empty square on the chess board.
Square.FullSquare
Represents a square occupied by a piece on the chess board.
Table
Represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for a chess game.
Table.BoardDirection
Enum representing the direction of the chess board.
Table.Movelog
Represents the move log of the game.
TakenPiecesPanel
Panel to display the taken pieces.
WhitePlayer
Represents a white player in a chess game.
